pr_title: Properly determine classpath locations in Flyway

timeline.body: Done because you can end up with multiple copies of the same file (especially since there is some inferring of file names going on)

timeline.body: Change the return type of this method to `Collection<String>` and you don't need to wrap the `LinkedHashSet` into another collection

replies.bodyText: Sure, but then I need to change all the rest as well. I don't think it's worth it TBH

replies.bodyText: Well, if you look what calls it you'll see it's already expecting Collection<String> so it's not a huge change
